text: Pierluigi Sangiorgi (born 7 October 1968) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in the individual dressage event at the 2008 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:People from Faenza
title: Pierluigi Sangiorgi
